metadata.title: Image to Video - Wan Ai AI Video Generator
metadata.description: Animate your images into videos using Wan 2.6 AI technology on Wan Ai platform.

page.title: Image to Video
page.description: Bring your images to life with AI. Upload any image and watch it transform into a dynamic video.

hero.title: Animate Images to Videos
hero.description: Upload an image and let Wan 2.6 AI transform it into a stunning animated video. Perfect for bringing static photos to life.

items.title: Easy Upload
items.description: Simply upload any image and our AI will animate it. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: Smart Animation
items.description: Wan 2.6 intelligently analyzes your image and creates natural, realistic motion.

items.title: Multiple Styles
items.description: Choose from various animation styles - zoom, pan, rotate, and more.

items.title: Preserve Quality
items.description: Maintains image quality while adding smooth, professional motion effects.

generator.title: Animate Your Image
generator.upload_placeholder: Drag and drop or click to upload
generator.prompt_placeholder: Describe how you want the image to move...

examples.title: Tips for Best Results
items: Use high-resolution images for better quality output
Images with clear subjects work best
Try different motion intensities for varied effects
Describe specific movements in the prompt for more control

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Pay only for what you use. No hidden fees.
